thread.title: Chris Martin and Annabelle Wallis Spotted Sharing Passionate Kiss in Paris
thread.title_full: Chris Martin and Annabelle Wallis Spotted Sharing Passionate Kiss in Paris

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Chris Martin and Annabelle Wallis Spotted Sharing Passionate Kiss in Paris
text:
Comments The Coldplay lead singer and his new girlfriend Annabelle were spotted kissing and dancing during a romatic stroll in Paris over the weekend. 
Chris Martin shows how much he's in love with his new girlfriend Annabelle Wallis . The Coldplay singer and his girlfriend were photographed packing on the PDA during a romantic stroll in Paris on Saturday, October 17. The 38-year-old musician looked casual in a gray T-shirt topped with leather jacket. He completed his look with black-and-red sneakers. Annabelle, meanwhile, wore a black turtleneck shirt featuring long sleeves, trousers and ankle boots of the same hue. The two were all smiles while strolling around the city. The British actress was photographed holding Chris' neck while sharing passionate kiss with him. At one point, they were spotted holding hands and dancing on the street. Chris and the 31-year-old actress were first romantically linked in mid-August, shortly after he ended his relationship with Jennifer Lawrence . At that time, the two were spotted enjoying a romantic dinner date at Lucali in Brooklyn and a source claimed that the pair were "very clearly a couple." Another source said of the musician, "He has moved on quickly and has been seeing Annabelle Wallis for about a month. He visited her while she was filming in Vancouver and really likes her."
